titleStmt.title: An admonition to all such as shall intend hereafter to enter the state of matrimony, godlily and agreeably to lawes set forth by the most reverend father in God, Matthew Arch-bishop of Canterbury ...
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Province of Canterbury. Archbishop (1559-1575 : Parker)
Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I. Okes, for Iohn Harrison, and are to be sold at the signe of the Unicorne in Pater-noster-row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in All Soul's College (University of Oxford). Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Unicorne in Pater-noster-row
